scene.name: The Entrance
description: You finally reached the entrance of the dungeon. From the number of skeleton around the massive door, you guess many have tempted to reached inside.
Hopefully for you, you already now how to enter and it is time for you to incant the spell
The energy required is 100000100 DAI, Are you ready?, The adventure awaits

scenes.name: look Door
description: The door is made of 2 massive panel made of what looks like some sort of metal
There is no visible locking mechanism and your heads woner how the spell works.
You trust the efficiency of magic but you always like to find an explanation beind its working

scenes.name: scratch the door with your sword
description: Just as you draw your sword, you feel some electricity in the air
the electricity intisify as you approach the blade to the door
It is probably a good idea to put your sword back

scenes.name: look behind
description: it has been a long way and you wonder if you ll ever see again these hills
And if you do, In how long would it be?

scenes.name: open the door
description: Your remember the spell words and incant them
You feel the energy being drained...

scene.name: Arrival
description: It’s dark when you arrive at the Ethernal. Gloom had set in hours before, and not just in terms of the weather. You knew the stories about this place: an ancient labyrinth cut into the valley floor, winding for hundreds of miles, if not more. Horrors haunted the passages: the remnants of a long-dead civilization that had passed on centuries before. What had caused it’s collapse? No one knew. Sounds like a bunch of scary stories to keep people away.

That’s because what people did know was what was left behind. Jewels. Gold. Magic scrolls. Ensorcelled weapons. Keep ‘em or sell ‘em: however you please! Most people did not come out when they entered the cave that you are now approaching, but those that did held enough wealth to set them up for life.

That’s why you’re here, carefully pacing down the darkened path. The forest has been silent for some time: a bad sign. Life should have continued right up until dusk. There’s a reason they have stayed away, but the reason you’ve come is stronger still. Get as much loot as you can, collect as many magical items as possible, and then get out. It wouldn’t do to become yet another death, not when there’s so much money left to spend.

scenes.name: look wall
description: the wall is white

scenes.name: inspect hole
description: as you look, you see an insect coming out
There is light other side...

scenes.name: look ceiling
description: The ceiling is weird

scenes.name: jump
description: too high

scene.name: The dasdas
description: Nowhere

scenes.name: look ground
description: the ground is green

scenes.name: break
description: Nothing happened
